title: collections
content: # `prefect.server.api.collections` ## Functions ### `read_view_content` ```python theme={null} read_view_content(view: str) -> Dict[str, Any] ``` Reads the content of a view from the prefect-collection-registry. ### `get_collection_view` ```python theme={null} get_collection_view(view: str) -> dict[str, Any] ```
